sentences.en: A comparison of dose - response curves for morbidity derived from epidemiological data or expert elicitation '; s.
sentences.cn: 通过对从 流行病 学或专家引导中获得的剂量反应曲线.

sentences.en: Elicitation Teaching is a kind of teaching thought, should run through entire teaching course.
sentences.cn: 摘要启发式教学是一种教学思想, 应该贯穿于整个教学过程.

sentences.en: The elicitation of his testimony was not easy.
sentences.cn: 在套他的供词时颇费周章.

sentences.en: You'd better do your teaching with the method of elicitation next class.
sentences.cn: 下节课你最好用启发式教学法.
